snippet: A local currency hit by months of political unrest, and skittish consumers spending less are keeping the pressure on Thai billionaire Dhanin Chearavanont, who heads Asia's most indebted food retailer....

headline.print_headline: Debt Headache for Thai Tycoon as Protests Bruise Baht
headline.main: Debt Headache for Thai Tycoon as Protests Bruise Baht

lead_paragraph: A local currency hit by months of political unrest, and skittish consumers spending less are keeping the pressure on Thai billionaire Dhanin Chearavanont, who heads Asia's most indebted food retailer.
